column1: Camellia was daughter of the head of the [[Sackville Family]]. She married [[Longo Baggins]], and had one son, [[Otho Sackville-Baggins
column3: Baggins}}</ref> The double surname [[Sackville-Baggins]] was bestowed on her son, after the death of Camellia's father, as he was the eldest grandson, and became the new head.<ref>{{L

column2: Camellia]] is a group of Asian plants.

column1: In early sketches of the Family Trees, Camellia was said to be from [[Michel Delving]].<ref>{{PM
